languages.text: "Вам ли не знать, что вся наша жизнь состоит из череды выборов? Удачных и не очень. Выборов простых, повседневных... {d|Encyclopedia:JaeQ2_DogmaticReinforcement}И меняющих жизни людей{/d}. Иногда — одной лишь банды. А иногда — миллионов". {n}Джай пожимает плечами почти безжизненно, хоть и улыбаясь при этом.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Вам ли не знать, что вся наша жизнь состоит из череды выборов? Удачных и не очень. Выборов простых, повседневных... И меняющих жизни людей. Иногда — одной лишь банды. А иногда — миллионов". {n}Джай пожимает плечами почти безжизненно, хоть и улыбвается привычным рядом жемчужин.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "You of all people should know that life is a series of decisions. Some great and some not so great. Simple, everyday decisions... and decisions that {d|Encyclopedia:JaeQ2_DogmaticReinforcement}change people's lives{/d}. Sometimes it might be the life of a single gang, and sometimes the lives of millions." {n}Jae gives a lifeless shrug, even as she attempts a smile.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Вам ли не знать, что вся наша жизнь состоит из череды выборов? Удачных и не очень. Выборов простых, повседневных... {d|Encyclopedia:JaeQ2_DogmaticReinforcement}И меняющих жизни людей{/d}. Иногда — одной лишь банды. А иногда — миллионов". {n}Джай пожимает плечами почти безжизненно, хоть и улыбаясь при этом.{/n}

Simple, everyday decisions... and decisions that {d|Encyclopedia:JaeQ2_DogmaticReinforcement}change people's lives{/d}. Sometimes it might be the life of a single gang, and sometimes the lives of millions." {n}Jae gives a lifeless shrug, even as she attempts a smile.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「人生は決断の連続だということを、あんたたちも知っておくべきよ。素晴らしいこともあれば、それほど素晴らしいくないこともあるの。毎日の単純な決断…そして、人々の{d|Encyclopedia:JaeQ2_DogmaticReinforcement}人生を変える{/d}決断も。時にはそれは一匹のギャングの人生かもしれないし、時には何百万もの人々の人生かもしれない」{n}ジェイは微笑もうとしたが、生気のない肩をすくめるのが精一杯だ。{/n}
languages.original_text: "You of all people should know that life is a series of decisions. Some great and some not so great. Simple, everyday decisions... and decisions that {d|Encyclopedia:JaeQ2_DogmaticReinforcement}change people's lives{/d}. Sometimes it might be the life of a single gang, and sometimes the lives of millions." {n}Jae gives a lifeless shrug, even as she attempts a smile.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「人生は決断の連続だということを、あんたたちも知っておくべきよ。素晴らしいこともあれば、それほど素晴らしいくないこともあるの。毎日の単純な決断…そして、人々の{d|Encyclopedia:JaeQ2_DogmaticReinforcement}人生を変える{/d}決断も。時にはそれは一匹のギャングの人生かもしれないし、時には何百万もの人々の人生かもしれない」{n}ジェイは微笑もうとしたが、生気のない肩をすくめるのが精一杯だ。{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “或许别人不明白，但你肯定明白，人生就是一连串选择的结果。有的选择微不足道，有的选择意义重大。有的选择仅仅牵扯到日常生活……还有的选择会{d|Encyclopedia:JaeQ2_DogmaticReinforcement}改变人们的命运{/d}。有时，它改变的是一群帮派成员的命运；有时，它改变的是亿万人民的人生。”{n}婕伊毫无生气地耸耸肩，试着露出笑容。{/n}
languages.original_text: "You of all people should know that life is a series of decisions. Some great and some not so great. Simple, everyday decisions... and decisions that {d|Encyclopedia:JaeQ2_DogmaticReinforcement}change people's lives{/d}. Sometimes it might be the life of a single gang, and sometimes the lives of millions." {n}Jae gives a lifeless shrug, even as she attempts a smile.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “或许别人不明白，但你肯定明白，人生就是一连串选择的结果。有的选择微不足道，有的选择意义重大。有的选择仅仅牵扯到日常生活……还有的选择会改变人们的命运。有时，它改变的是一群帮派成员的命运；有时，它改变的是亿万人民的人生。”{n}婕伊毫无生气地耸耸肩，试着露出笑容。{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: «Sabe mejor que nadie que la vida es una serie de decisiones. Algunas buenas y otras no tanto; algunas sencillas y cotidianas... y otras que pueden {d|Encyclopedia:JaeQ2_DogmaticReinforcement}cambiar vidas{/d}. En ocasiones solo cambian las de un grupo pequeño y en otras las de millones de personas». {n}Jae encoge los hombros sin ánimo, aun procurando sonreír.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You of all people should know that life is a series of decisions. Some great and some not so great. Simple, everyday decisions... and decisions that {d|Encyclopedia:JaeQ2_DogmaticReinforcement}change people's lives{/d}. Sometimes it might be the life of a single gang, and sometimes the lives of millions." {n}Jae gives a lifeless shrug, even as she attempts a smile.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Sabe mejor que nadie que la vida es una serie de decisiones. Algunas buenas y otras no tanto; algunas sencillas y cotidianas... y otras que pueden cambiar vidas. En ocasiones solo cambian las de un grupo pequeño y en otras las de millones de personas». {n}Jae encoge los hombros sin ánimo, aun procurando sonreír.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Vous êtes bien {mf|placé|placée} pour savoir que la vie n'est qu'un enchaînement de décisions. Certaines sont bonnes, d'autres moins. Il y en a des simples, des quotidiennes... et certaines qui {d|Encyclopedia:JaeQ2_DogmaticReinforcement}changent la vie des autres{/d}. Parfois, cela signe l'arrêt de mort d'une simple bande, parfois celui de millions d'âmes. » {n}Jae hausse les épaules et tente d'esquisser un sourire.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You of all people should know that life is a series of decisions. Some great and some not so great. Simple, everyday decisions... and decisions that {d|Encyclopedia:JaeQ2_DogmaticReinforcement}change people's lives{/d}. Sometimes it might be the life of a single gang, and sometimes the lives of millions." {n}Jae gives a lifeless shrug, even as she attempts a smile.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Vous êtes bien {mf|placé|placée} pour savoir que la vie n'est qu'un enchaînement de décisions. Certaines sont bonnes, d'autres moins. Il y en a des simples, des quotidiennes... et certaines qui changent la vie des autres. Parfois, cela signe l'arrêt de mort d'une simple bande, parfois celui de millions d'âmes. » {n}Jae hausse les épaules et tente d'esquisser un sourire.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Gerade Ihr solltet wissen, dass das Leben eine Abfolge von Entscheidungen ist. Manche sind gut, andere weniger. Simple Alltagsentscheidungen ... und andere, die {d|Encyclopedia:JaeQ2_DogmaticReinforcement}das Leben von Menschen verändern{/d}. Manchmal geht es um eine kleine Bande, manchmal um Millionen von Leben." {n}Jae zuckt kraftlos mit den Schultern und versucht gleichzeitig, zu lächeln.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You of all people should know that life is a series of decisions. Some great and some not so great. Simple, everyday decisions... and decisions that {d|Encyclopedia:JaeQ2_DogmaticReinforcement}change people's lives{/d}. Sometimes it might be the life of a single gang, and sometimes the lives of millions." {n}Jae gives a lifeless shrug, even as she attempts a smile.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Gerade Ihr solltet wissen, dass das Leben eine Abfolge von Entscheidungen ist. Manche sind gut, andere weniger. Simple Alltagsentscheidungen ... und andere, die das Leben von Menschen verändern. Manchmal geht es um eine kleine Bande, manchmal um Millionen von Leben." {n}Jae zuckt kraftlos mit den Schultern und versucht gleichzeitig, zu lächeln.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Hayat, verilen kararlardan ibarettir. Bunu en iyi senin bilmen lazım. Kararların kimi doğru, kimi yanlış. Kimi sıradan, gündelik kararlarken kimiyse {d|Encyclopedia:JaeQ2_DogmaticReinforcement}insan hayatına yön verir{/d}. Bazen küçük bir çetenin, bazen de milyonların canı söz konusudur." {n}Jae, ruhsuzca omuz silkip zoraki gülümsüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You of all people should know that life is a series of decisions. Some great and some not so great. Simple, everyday decisions... and decisions that {d|Encyclopedia:JaeQ2_DogmaticReinforcement}change people's lives{/d}. Sometimes it might be the life of a single gang, and sometimes the lives of millions." {n}Jae gives a lifeless shrug, even as she attempts a smile.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Hayat, verilen kararlardan ibarettir, en iyi senin bilmen lazım. Kararların kimi doğru, kimi yanlış. Kimi sıradan, gündelik kararlarken kimi {d|Encyclopedia:JaeQ2_DogmaticReinforcement}insan hayatına yön verir{/d}. Bazen küçük bir çetenin, bazen de milyonların canı söz konusudur." {n}Jae, ruhsuzca omuz silkip zoraki şekilde gülümsüyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
